properties.name: rds.auth.db-user
properties.description: User that has been created in the database that this application will use.

properties.name: rds.auth.region
properties.description: The region in which the database is running.

properties.name: rds.auth.db-host
properties.description: The host name of the RDS box that the DB is running on.

properties.name: rds.auth.db-port
properties.description: The port that the DB is available on.
